vclaim: In 2013, actor Anthony Hopkins wrote a fan letter to fellow actor Bryan Cranston, saying his performance as Walter White in "Breaking Bad" was "the best acting I have seen - ever."
title: Did Anthony Hopkins Write a Fan Letter to Bryan Cranston and the Cast of ‘Breaking Bad’?
subtitle: The “Silence of the Lambs” Oscar winner binge-watched the critically acclaimed series.
author: Nur Ibrahim
